creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: basket and removable lid; brown; circular basket with flat base; walls flare slightly near base and rise vertically; four dark brown woven zig-zag bands in diagonal pattern around basket; opening of basket is finished with braid weave; basket walls angled slightly to one side; lid of basket is funnel-shaped with wide opening tapering toward top to end in a point; opening of lid is finished with spiral wrapping
title: Lidded basket
